Title: Setting Up Your Xiaohongshu Account and Store
Content: To start selling on Xiaohongshu, the first step is to set up your account and store. It's recommended to prepare 3 to 6 accounts to test different products and increase your chances of success. Each product should be tested with at least two accounts. For full-time sellers, it's advisable to use one phone per account to avoid any potential issues with the platform's algorithms. When setting up your store, you can choose between a personal store, an individual business store, or a corporate store. Ensure you have the necessary documentation, such as a personal ID or a business license, and consider the type of products you plan to sell. For example, selling food products requires a food business license. Once your account is set up, you can proceed to open a store and start listing products.

Title: Understanding Professional Accounts and Store Types
Content: On Xiaohongshu, a professional account is necessary to access advanced features like store creation and product promotion. A professional account can be created by upgrading a regular account through the 'Creation Center' on the platform. This upgrade allows you to open a store, promote products, and access additional tools like the 'Buyers' Center' and 'Promotion Tools.' There are different types of stores you can open, including personal stores, individual business stores, and corporate stores. Each type has specific requirements and benefits. For instance, a personal store can be opened with a personal ID, while a corporate store requires a business license. Additionally, each professional account can be linked to multiple stores, allowing for greater flexibility in managing different product lines.

Title: Operational Tips for Xiaohongshu Stores
Content: Managing a Xiaohongshu store involves several key operational steps. First, ensure your account is verified and upgraded to a professional account. This allows you to access features necessary for store management. Next, focus on selecting the right products to sell. Use multiple accounts to test different products and identify those with the highest potential. Once products are selected, list them in your store and create engaging content to promote them. Regularly update your store and interact with customers to build trust and loyalty. Additionally, be aware of the platform's rules and guidelines to avoid penalties. For example, using one phone per account and avoiding duplicate content can help maintain your account's standing. Finally, monitor your store's performance and adjust your strategies based on sales data and customer feedback.
